title: "Am i going to jail for a careless driving charge in Odessa FL if i hit a tree and a passenger has a bodily injury?"
excerpt: "Careless driving is an infraction that is not subject to jail time. Reckless driving is a crime and subject to possible jail time. If you have any doubt of what you are being charged with, consult with an attorney."
